Name: Gravitron 2
About the game: Gravitron 2 is a retro styled arcade gravity shooter in which you must pilot your way through some of the most devious terrains ever devised. Key Features: 40+ stages packed full of enemies and traps 3D sound in a 2D enviroment Online highscores Configurable controls Stylized neon vector graphics Bucket load full of particle effects Dramatic musical scores 10 Achievement awards (Steam version exclusive)
